summary: An email from Jeffrey Epstein dated October 23, 2010, with a subject line referencing 'time with daddy' and 'great fun', containing a standard confidentiality and attorney-client privilege disclaimer. The document appears to be a communication from Epstein with legal protections asserted.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein sent an email on October 23, 2010, with a subject line that reads 'time with daddy, great fun'.
The email includes a standard confidentiality and attorney-client privilege disclaimer, asserting legal protections for the communication.
The document is part of the Epstein case files and is labeled EFTA00015062, indicating it was obtained or reviewed as part of the investigation.
